title: Ashok Leyland total sales down 8pc at 13,928 units in July
description: Ashok Leyland's total sales in July 2024 decreased by 8% to 13,928 units, compared to 15,068 units in July 2023. Domestic sales fell by 9% to 12,926 units. The company saw a 14% reduction in medium and heavy commercial vehicle sales, while light commercial vehicle sales remained steady.
